content: shrug is worked flat in one piece from lower back hem to upper front ribbing then folded and seamed **check out this video tutorial 1 ** yarn approximately 1 500 yards fingering weight yarn held double sample shown in mary maxim twinkle 320yds/50g needle us 10 6 mm 48 circular needle gauge 16 sts and 22 row = 4 in stockinette 1 https //www youtube com/shorts/brygvxi3agc
